item.title: Peapods: Ising Monte Carlo in Rust
item.description: Simulating spin glasses at scale has always been a pain — Python is too slow, and C++ is too painful. Peapods is my attempt at a middle ground: a Monte Carlo package for Ising spin systems where the hot loops are written in Rust and everything else stays in Python, glued together with PyO3. You just pip install peapods and go.
